Class UserBusinessService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gcu.business.UserBusinessService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserBusinessServiceInterface

    public class UserBusinessService
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserBusinessServiceInterface
    This class offers all application specific logic for handling user information, registration, and login

      • LoginUser

        public boolean LoginUser(java.lang.String userName,
                         java.lang.String password)
        This method takes a users login and compares it with the information in the database
        Specified by:
        LoginUser in interface UserBusinessServiceInterface
        Parameters:
        userName - the current users login name
        password - the current users password
        Returns:
        will return true if the login information matches, false otherwise

      • RegisterUser

        public boolean RegisterUser(java.lang.String firstName,
                            java.lang.String lastName,
                            java.lang.String email,
                            java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                            java.lang.String userName,
                            java.lang.String password)
        This method attempts to add the user to the database. Does not check for duplicate userName.
        Specified by:
        RegisterUser in interface UserBusinessServiceInterface
        Parameters:
        firstName - The user's first name.
        lastName - The user's last name.
        email - The user's email address
        phoneNumber - The user's phone number.
        userName - The user's selected user name.
        password - The password for the user's new login.
        Returns:
        true if the user was registered into the database.

      • CheckDuplicateUserName

        public boolean CheckDuplicateUserName(java.lang.String userName)
        This method checks the database for a duplicate userName
        Specified by:
        CheckDuplicateUserName in interface UserBusinessServiceInterface
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name to check for
        Returns:
        will return true if there is a duplicate user, false if their is no user by that userName
